tool.name: SARTools DESeq2
tool.description: Compare two or more biological conditions in a RNA-Seq framework with DESeq2

param.label: Mean-variance relationship
param.help: Type of model for the mean-dispersion relationship. Parametric by default.

param.label: Transformation for PCA/clustering
param.help: Method of transformation of the counts for the clustering and the PCA: 'VST' (default) for Variance Stabilizing Transformation, or 'rlog' for Regularized Log Transformation.
